content: Latest update to Zulip is instantly crashing multiple Win10 PCs here. I appear to have 2.3.82 but after I hit Check For Updates the Zulip crashes are happening. Nothing is being written to Event Log - could this be a Windows Defender issue I wonder?
Nothing in Windows Defender logs. Zulip just opens and closes within seconds. Removing and deleting all Zulip folders and installing an older version is a workaround but not great for 70+ users.
@desktop fyi. Any way we can pull the update?
